title: why does every rengar thread have 60 comments defending rengar?
body: are people actually dumb enough to think he's acceptable right now, or are they just playing devil's advocate when it's totally unnecessary?

replies.body: In their defense, most of those 60 comments contribute about as much to the discussion as this thread.

Some people get sick pleasure out of futilely trying to defend the QQ target of the week. This week just happens to be Rengar. I'm looking forward to whoever it is next week. I'm kinda hoping it's {{champion:55}}; we haven't really had any good Kat QQ here in a long time.

That's never stopped them from complaining about Yasuo.

Rengar's case is really funny tho.
Since his release EVERY pre-season ended with a ton of QQ on him, then when the actual season start, (pro) players find some over things to abuse and everyone forget about him until the next pre-season.

And the cycle of the board continue, again and again...
People who think differently than you do are dumb. Got it.

If you call for nerfs on a champion, some will support you, while others will not. How is this not really obvious?

Do you expect unanimous consent?

Some things are petty obvious, like "Racism is stupid"
Aye, but in (sizable) mixed company, there'll always someone who'll voice dissent. Even with something as clear-cut as "Racism is bad, mkay?"
Rengar is like Teemo. Annoying. After you start adjusting your strategy to deal with him, however, he becomes a joke to deal with. Much like Teemo.
Rengar has significantly less counterplay than Teemo, while Teemo can be pretty bursty with his blinding target he has nowhere near the damage, mobility, and reliability that Rengar has.

Not to mention Teemo doesn't really contribute to teamfights almost at all, that's why he got the changes and tweaks.
Rengar however is a massive teamfight threat as a bruiser/assassin.

I think too much of his power lies in his empowerment and that punishes players whenever they fall behind but snowballs them ridiculously if ahead.

Their main argument is "Wull if he was nurfed he woodent get any killz  and he would be totarry useress brah"

if that is the main argument in defending a champion nerf/buff then that is a sign he needs a rework instead of a number tuneup. We're just trying to fix him tbh not make you hate playing rengar.

Fix rengar!!

I'm still not sure why kill based champions are problematic. People insist that they are, but I don't really agree.
Yeah, everyone with a brain knows this. It's just that OP sadly doesn't fall in that category.

Because if you take away his burst he is a shitty champion who has nothing but a 1.75 second snare. If I wanted that I would go Morg.

He was fine before the yellow trinket was made crap, and pinks took a whole item slot. His kit is pretty binary though, either being so fed you oneshot or so weak you are useless. He needs a rework of sorts if we aren't getting proper vision back.

I like having Rengars because no matter how fed the enemy ADC may be, he will be dead as long as he and I exist.
Shit like {{champion:12}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:117}} can screw him up if timed properly.

:^)

But on all seriousness whenever there's a thread complaining about a certain champ, someone who mains that champ is going to show up whether you like it or not, and will try to defend about it depending on how reasonable the claim seems. Lots of people defending Rengar? Probably because that's how many people like playing as Rengar, they like 100-0'ing ADCs.
Reminds me of how every request to rework yasou & leesin has a -10 from all the fanboys.
